articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Ron DeSantis drops out of 2024 election, leaving Haley to take on Trump
articles.description: The winner of this year's Republican nominating contests will take on President Joe Biden, the likely Democratic nominee, in the general election in November. At a Haley campaign event in Seabrook, New Hampshire, as the state's voters prepare to head to the polls for the primary on Tuesday, the former South Carolina governor drew cheers when she announced that DeSantis had dropped out.
